ItemTooltips.ward_observer: ward everything and everywhere. wanna know how to ward? go play LOL, then come here
ItemTooltips.courier: 1st item u need to buy. seriously, just buy it
ItemTooltips.mekansm: heal-heal-heal... The main item, actually. If things going ok on the map, mek must be ready in 15 minutes til the game starts.
ItemTooltips.flying_courier: upgrade courier when its possible. That will help you teamates and bla bla bla.
ItemTooltips.ultimate_scepter: Maybe its not so cool item for you, cuz it cost too much. And its true. But (!) Im playing a really loooong time, and i can say that if you have an aghanim, bloody, scepter, its 99% you won the game.
ItemTooltips.arcane_boots: Only arcane boots and nothing else. Not only your main creep (Chen) needs mana for his skills. Your bro's need it too. Centaurs, goblins, satyrs, whatever

AbilityTooltips.chen_penitence: no need to max that skill at the beginning. test of faith is much better. but on the late game pentience is really good because of slow
AbilityTooltips.chen_test_of_faith: 1) one of the best nukes, i guess. 200-400 pure dmg to enemy's ass is very annoying.
AbilityTooltips.chen_test_of_faith_teleport:
2) you can save your buddies by sending them back to home
3) dont forget about delay. use it wiser. (on lvl 4 its 3 seconds)
AbilityTooltips.chen_hand_of_god: global heal. but dont forget about delay, again. its like 0,7-1 sec. so use it before someone dies.
